scripts.start: cd combyne-client && npm install && npm start && cd ../combyne-server && npm install && npm start
scripts.start:dev: cd combyne-client && npm install && npm start && cd ../combyne-server && npm install && npm start:dev
scripts.start:debug: cd combyne-client && npm install && npm start && cd ../combyne-server && npm install && npm start:debug
scripts.build: cd combyne-client && npm install && npm run build && cd ../combyne-server && npm install && npm run build
scripts.postinstall: cd combyne-client && npm install && npm run build && cd ../combyne-server && npm install && npm run build
